description.value:
If you lose an eye or appendage, it grows back over the course of 7 days. Whenever you spend a rest die to regain hit points, you can regain extra hit points on a low roll, as detailed below:

  • D4 rest die: When you roll a 2 or lower on the die, add 2 to the total.
  • D6 rest die: When you roll a 3 or lower on the die, add 3 to the total.
  • D8 rest die: When you roll a 4 or lower on the die, add 4 to the total.
  • D10 rest die: When you roll a 5 or lower on the die, add 5 to the total.
  • D12 rest die: When you roll a 6 or lower on the die, add 6 to the total.
